articles.title: Space Debris Threatened Crew Of ISS - Radio Free Europe/ Radio Liberty
articles.description: France and NATO have joined the United States in condemning Russia for conducting a missile test that blew up a defunct Russian satellite, creating a debris cloud that endangered the International Space Station (ISS) -- an accusation dismissed by the Kremlin.
